DOC.detailed_description: The study consist several on-line survey ass woman 's vasculitis severity , pregnancy-related experience , pregnancy outcome . Participants ask complete questionnaire study entry , second trimester , third trimester , postpartum . Investigators estimate take approximately 20 minute complete survey . All woman enrol Vasculitis Patient-Powered Research Network ( V-PPRN ) ( specified disease , sex , age inclusion criterion describe ) invite via email participate on-line study . The survey data store Data Management Coordinating Center ( DMCC ) University South Florida . Upon conclusion study period , data send Study Chairs .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 18 year age old one follow disease may take part study : Behcet 's disease ; CNS vasculitis ; cryoglobulinemic vasculitis ; eosinophilic granulomatosis polyangiitis ( ChurgStrauss ) ; granulomatosis polyangiitis ( Wegener 's ) ; IgA vasculitis ( HenochSchoenlein purpura ) ; microscopic polyangiitis ; polyarteritis nodosa ; Takayasu 's arteritis ; urticarial vasculitis . 2 .
